quoteText:
We do not support the 'Do Not Track' browser option.
Instead we offer you the choices described in this policy to manage the collection and use of information about you.
You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.
title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
